amendment.description: An amendment numbered 228 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase and decrease the Army Reserve account by $7,000,000 to address road safety issues at military bases.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kim amendment (A078) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kim amendment (A078) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A078) offered by Mr. Kim.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
